name: Rescue Firefighter Operation
description:
Play the rescue firefighter operation 3D game you are part of firefighter team and you act like a fireman. You mission is to save the innocent citizens from burning fire in this firefighting game simulator. Save innocent lives in given time and become a real fireman hero of rescue games. Fire brigade rescues department works hard for fire rescue firefighting operations. Cooling down the fire with rescue operation in the city.
Get on the emergency rescue mission and drive the modern vehicle carrying wide range of firefighting equipment loaded with aerial apparatus, ladders, emergency medical kits, first aid box and self-contained breathing medical gadgets to carry out successful rescue missions as the duty of the brave firefighter is not an easy. Dash your truck on the busy wipe out roads dodging like crazy rider through the big city transport, hurry but don’t get clash with the traffic and be the first to reach the disaster zone fight the flames down to the last spark. Spot the location to save people including kids and children from the blazing fire, combat your way into the wrecked structures of the damaged city building and houses on flames and strike the water in effected area. A fireman’s life is full of adventure and thrills with challenging mission all around the clock have great responsibility to help and protect the public in crises, a good fireman always responds calls as and when needed, such as car accidents and clashes, chemical spills, flooding, water rescue. You have to do following tasks to become a real fire man. You are the mission chief in this firefighting game and after completing the first task you will move to the next dangerous task and it will prove a great adventure for you to play this next level firefighting game.The best thing in this fireman games is its controls which are totally based on realistic physics and you can easily drive the truck simulator fast and control the speed of the truck easily 911 rescue game. And this is the best firefighting games for those who have racing fever and want to drive the vehicles fast in city streets. So, we welcome you in one of the amazing gameplay fireman rescue simulator game.
Take position a firefighter hero city savior and ride rescue firefighter operation truck. The map is giving to guide a driver towards the fire. Start driving heavy duty Firefighter truck today and extinguish all burning equipment in a limited time. Firefighter superhero city rescue is a unique gameplay with a variety stunts and loads of missions. A most addictive game with a big fire truck in ambulance emergency car driving 3D. Ultimate fireman to go on firefighter truck road trip with your favorite truck parking simulator. American Grand Firefighter & City Rescue Ambulance Mission you enjoy the entrusting missions. Drive fast to car accident spot in multi-story parking plaza, park your fireman rescue truck and use the fire hose to put out the blaze.
It’s a challenging and dangerous emergency rescue service where your mad driving or truck for rescue driving skills enhance and tested your extreme skills. Get ready to secure city fire building or vehicle location and perform you rescue duty as a brave and amazing fireman and emergency driver. Avoid the heavy traffic road that will make your cube truck duty more difficult to drive with in given time. When you drive rescue truck emergency siren on because people aware about emergency. You have to reach on the accident or fire location and control as soon as possible. When you play this game you can use your parking and firefighting skills to avoid damage or hit city vehicles.
Features
- Real ambulance sounds effects.
- Smooth and simple controls.
- Very real fire based scenarios and story line.
- Lots of Exciting missions.
- Amazing background sound to enhance your gaming experience.
- It is paid game available on app store.
